item.title: Approx 12 inch pothole in the middle of the road, 1st April
item.description:
In the middle of the road and between numbers 7 & 10. As the road contents are discharged by vehicles driving over them, I am at the moment able to kick the bigger chunks back in.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Sheepscombe Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
